title: Jio Financial Services launches rental services for laptops, phones, airfiber and other tech devices
description: Jio Financial Services is introducing Device as a Service (DaaS) as a corporate financing model, allowing companies to lease devices instead of buying them to enhance cash flow and IT fleet management. The company, a carve-out from Reliance Industries, aims to create a new market model for consumer devices by offering finance and operating leases for assets like airfiber, phones, and laptops.
